00148   long convertToTimeType(std::string date) {
00149     
00150       if(date.size()==0) {
00151         return 0;
00152       }
00153          
00154       boost::posix_time::ptime pt(time_from_string(date));
00155       boost::posix_time::ptime epoch(boost::gregorian::date(1970,1,1));
00156       time_duration::sec_type time = (pt - epoch).total_seconds();
00157      
00158     return time_t(time);
00159 
00160   }

00168   void checkUserId(std::string userId) {
00169     std::string sqlUserRequest = "SELECT userid from users where userid='"+userId+"'";
00170     DatabaseResult *user = mdatabaseVishnu->getResult(sqlUserRequest.c_str());
00171     if(user->getNbTuples()==0) {
00172        throw UMSVishnuException(ERRCODE_UNKNOWN_USERID);
00173     }
00174   }

00234   void checkStatus(const int& status) {
00235      if((status < 0) || (status > 1)) {
00236        throw UMSVishnuException(ERRCODE_UNKNOWN_OPTION, "Invalid Status value: its value must be 0 or 1");
00237      }

00246       if((closePolicy < 0) || (closePolicy > 2)) {
00247          throw UMSVishnuException(ERRCODE_UNKNOWN_CLOSURE_MODE, "Invalid ClosePolicy value: its value must be 0, 1 or 2");
